concept.title: Coding requirements for specialization modules
concept.shortdesc: The base DITA element and attribute types may be extended through the creation of new vocabulary modules that define specializations of more-general types.

conbody.draft-comment: Should make sure the shortdescs for nested topics are consistent. 2 use "implementation (coding) requirements" and one uses "coding requirements". Also, I don't think this ensures backwards compatibility, at least with regards to non-OASIS specializations, or am I missing something?
